    "maple": [
        "b:= proc(n, t, h, c) option remember; `if`(abs(c)>3*n, 0,",
        "     `if`(n=0, 1, b(n-1, [1, 3, 1][t], 2, c-`if`(h=3, 3, 0))",
        "                + b(n-1, 2, [1, 3, 1][h], c+`if`(t=3, 1, 0))))",
        "    end:",
        "a:= n-> b(n, 1$2, 0):",
        "seq(a(n), n=0..50);"
